website_summaries.verdict: This blanket is a decent size and offers advanced features, including three timer settings and a variable temperature knob.
pros: Three-position timer shuts blanket off after 30 minutes, 45 minutes, or 1 hour
cons: Cord is on the short side
Some complaints that the blanket does not get hot enough

customer_reviews.title: Keeps You Warm
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this blanket! We bought it because the pass was snowing and the husband had to take the car that's heater wasn't working. We've been putting off getting the heater fixed like always. We plugged this in and it kept him warm on his way over with temps in the teens. Probably not what you are supposed to use it for but it worked. I would like to get more for our other vehicles in case of emergency situations.
customer_reviews.author: CJShoffner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of heat
customer_reviews.text: The heat in my car is broken. Since I live in Florida, I don’t get the cold like the north. This is perfect for keeping me warm when I have to get into a cold car. It gives off the perfect amount of heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my MIL to use while she picks up my kids from school in the car line. This keeps her warm and cozy!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Decker

customer_reviews.title: Great product & value
customer_reviews.text: We live in Upstate NY and have an emergency safety bag in each one of our vehicles. These are perfect for the winter, and we use them on the back seat when we take our dog along. Heats up quickly and stays warm without getting too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Cox

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, warm comfort
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the blanket for passengers in the back seat of our vehicle, so the ones in the front aren't toasted, in order for those in the back to be comfortable. The granddaughters loved it on our recent drive through the Grand Tetons!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long to warm up
customer_reviews.text: It was OK. Not great but not bad either. My only dislike is, by the time it is warm my car has already warmed up. Takes a bit to get the whole blanket nice and warm. But it does have a good cord length!
customer_reviews.author: ck burke

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice warm blanket for the back seat of our truck. Granddaughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very warm
customer_reviews.text: Heater broke in my Jeep and this has helped me get through the cold this winter would definitely recommend! Not washable though, but it's not a bad price
customer_reviews.author: James S Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my mother, she is always cold year round. She is going to love it. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Mya Ann

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier with a purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It’s get warmer than I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Canfam04

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the winter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted this for her car and it worked out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: love to cook!!

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to try
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery. Can't wait to see how this works with my 96 year old aunt in the car. She is always cold.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Morris

customer_reviews.title: Not that warm. But it’s ok.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t get as hot as I’d like it to. But it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amartei A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Gets nice n warm and is great in my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Richter

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves this!
customer_reviews.text: Given to my husband as a gift, he has a long drive to work in the early morning hours.. he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: For the car!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t read or understand well. Didn’t realize you plug it into cig lighter in car.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ippolito

customer_reviews.title: Takes a long time to heat up and doesn't even get very warm
customer_reviews.text: it's a decent blanket. big enough to wrap around your upper body when you're cold. but it takes awhile to heat up and doesn't get very hot even on the highest heat.
customer_reviews.author: cal

customer_reviews.title: Not enough heat
customer_reviews.text: I left the blanket on for 30 min came back and checked, It was just the same as before. It didn't work for me at all
customer_reviews.author: Suman Khanal

customer_reviews.title: Not what I need. 😥
customer_reviews.text: I guess I missed the 12volt part. Was hoping it was electric!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money with this blanket.
customer_reviews.text: very poor quality. it says it can do 110 degrees farenheit but it barely gets to 85 degrees at full capacity. I used seek thermal camera to determine the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly finder

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these blankets 10 months ago. Both have been used a half dozen times. Now neither work. All of the lights on the controllers light up and the blankets do not work. Does not seem to be a way to reset. If seller could send replacements since its been under a year with minimal use I would test again and potentially upgrade this review.
customer_reviews.author: RealRiggs

customer_reviews.title: Red, green, and yellow lights stay on...doesn't heat.
customer_reviews.text: This was great for about 3- 45min car rides. I was so happy I bought another as a gift and it will be delivered tomorrow. We got a ton of snow today in northern Wisconsin and I was pumped to use this on my 45 minute commute. Plug it in and the red, green and yellow lights stay on steady and it doesn't heat up at all. Won't let you turn it off, or turn on the timer...just stays illuminated. Going to be returning this and the one that's on the way to save myself some embarrassment.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Poor travel blanket
customer_reviews.text: The first one never worked - the light just kept blinking. The replacement I got only partially worked - on the lowest setting and the blanket barely got warm.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Kull

customer_reviews.title: Warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this gets as hot as the manufacturer claims,but it's warm enough to do what it's supposed to do, takes only a minute to warm up,and controls are very easy to use..It is comfortable and will keep you warm,but probably not hot..
customer_reviews.author: Nedzad Mehic

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy material.
customer_reviews.text: I freeze every winter. I have a heated steering wheel and seat but my legs are still cold. I bought this blanket and it’s a good size, works well and I get warm quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: Works very well and keeps me nice and cozy during those cold rides home!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby C.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Perfect no issues. Heat on top part of switch, timer on bottom.
customer_reviews.author: G. W. Murray

product_meta.title: Sojoy iHealthComfort 12V Electric Heated Travel Blanket with Intelligent Temp Controller 30/60/90 mins Timer High, Medium, Low 60"x 40" (Black and White) BHO-006
feature_bullets: Instant warmth,it can quickly increase the temperature while heating,warm in an instant so you will stays warm on the coldest weather while driving,traveling or even at home
It can freely choose the temperature from 30℃ to 60℃.Default temperature is 51℃
Timing power off protection, you can choose 30 mins,45 mins or 60 mins.Default timing is 45 mins

It is equipped with electric protection device,when the temperature reach you choose,it will automatically power off,when the temperature gets lower than you choose,it will automatically work again,so you can use it at ease
12V Heated Travel Cars, SUVs, Trucks Camping Blanket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
